results.name: Job Stock
results.overview: Job Stock is a freelance and outsourcing marketplace for individuals and businesses looking to hire freelance contractors, post freelance jobs, or those looking to develop a consistent revenue stream through selling freelance services online.

results.name: Job Board Reviews
results.overview:
Job Board Reviews is a site based on the vision of a Recruiter, Internet Sourcer, and former Marketing Manager of a sales job board with one goal in mind, to make the Internet a better place for those in the Job Market.  Job Board Reviews was born out of necessity.


Searching for a job is a very stressful endeavor. There are so many job boards out there — how do you know where to start and where NOT to waste your time. The creators of JBR's were tired of searching through so many job sites seeing the same exact jobs and paying to surface candidates from job boards that were simply "stealing" from other job sites. JBR is designed to help both job seekers and employers find the best possible job boards for their needs in every industry and position. We try to help solve the problem so many job seekers have of applying to jobs and never hearing a response and avoid employers wasting A LOT of time and money posting open positions that are never seen and never filled.

results.name: Hacker Jobs UK
results.overview:
A new Tech Job board aiming to elevate job boards to the next level and eliminate the reliance on 3rd party recruiters.

Hacker Jobs UK is not your typical job board.
The reason Hacker Jobs UK exists in the first place is because there is a sincere lack of high quality job boards available for the tech community in the UK.

There are plenty of options for job seekers out there but they are either saturated by recruiters or the jobs are incredibly generic and middle of the road.

There is a clear distinction between your regular Software Developer and the kind that read Hacker News on a daily basis as well as commit to personal projects on github because that's their idea of fun. It's the latter Hacker Jobs UK want to accommodate as it's the latter that is largely ignored within the current market place offerings.

results.name: The Green Job Bank
results.overview:
TheGreenJobBank.com is the US #1 Green Jobs Search Website. TheGreenJobBank's crawlers index Green jobs from thousands of Green employers websites, Green job boards and general job boards.

The Green Job Bank features over 10,000 green jobs, hundreds of Green employer profiles, and dozens of Green Education Programs. Job seekers have all of the resources they need in one place to find a job and research the Green companies for which they want to work.

results.name: USA Job Blast
results.overview:
USA Job Blast takes the mystery and work out of recruiting on social networks and across the web.

Since job seekers (and passive candidates) are everywhere, job postings need the widest distribution. www.usajobblast.com does just that. One simple post and your job is distributed to the most popular social networking sites (including linkedin.com, facebook.com, myspace.com), blasted across the web (through indeed.com, simplyhired, google base, and oodle), and tweeted to followers of our tweets AND your company twitter followers. Now candidates can find your jobs on their computers, phones and other mobile devices no matter how they look for a job: through search engines, vertical aggregators, social networking sites. And  the use of SEM allows passive candidates to be targeted while viewing associated web content.

results.name: Job Search Page
results.overview:
Jobsearchpage.com is a search engine for jobs.  Use job search page to search 1000's of jobs from across the web all in one spot.

Job Search page makes it easy for jobseekers to find jobs that would otherwise be hard to find.

Search Job Search page and get hired!

results.name: Wisdom Jobs
results.overview: Wisdom Jobs portal is a unique and specialized 4th generation job portal for job search and knowledge acquirement (a new feature).It is the integration of student activities (Planning, Preparation, Practice, Presentation and Personality) and job activities (searching, short listing, stabilizing, and satisfying). The outstanding features of Wisdomjobs.com, “Pragnya Meter” (a sophisticated talent filter which allows you to expose your technical and managing ability level along with the resume ) and “e- university” (a store-house of infinite skill set certifications, including 6000 skill set contents,50 million multiple option questions and 30 million interview questions) will facilitate the job seeker in achieving his goal.

results.name: Parttime jobs For all
results.overview: Parttime jobs for All offers Online jobs, Part time jobs, home based jobs, internet jobs, Data Entry jobs over internet.

results.name: mangofizz jobs
results.overview: This self learning technology operates existing webservices and new forthcoming innovations such as job seeker to employer / recruiter / job ad matching and indexing all internet posted job ads. Of particular value is the proprietary matching system which makes choice for the employer, recruiter and job seeker more focused and much easier and will significantly reduce the total cost of hiring.  mangofizz.com is currently implementing a proprietary GIS system which creates a global view through a single interface for all employers, recruiters and job seekers.

results.name: Simply Jobs
results.overview: Simply Jobs lets you search local job listings from all top job boards in one easy job search.
